Author: Jane
Diag: You don't have to do this. We can find another way to make money!

Author: Jane
Diag: If I don't then we'll get kicked out onto the streets! Can't you see? I'm doing this for us. The economy is going south fast and my only goal is to feed you.

Author: Jane
Diag: Okay, just please, be safe. I'll try and think of something else in the meantime.

Author: Thief
Diag: This'll be a quick in and out. Don't make a sound and don't leave a trace.

Author: Thief
Diag: Before we go, I got us a new toy we can use. I call it the Claw Grabber. With this bad boy we'll be able to get anything from a distance. Should be useful.
ItemDiag: You'll be a pro with it in no time!

Author: Thief
Diag: Guess we'll just have to wait and see.
ItemDiag: This could definitely make my life easier to not get spotted.

Author: Officer
Diag: Evening, what are you doing out so late?

Author: Officer
Diag: Just going out for my nightly jog officer.

Author: Officer
Diag: Is that so? Well you be safe then.
ItemDiag: Is that so? Strange thing to be having when you're just going on a jog...

Author: Officer
Diag: Is that so? Well you be safe then.
ItemDiag: You look injured, maybe come with me.
